ChunkText: a simple google search will also show if the company and contacts are legitimate. reach out to the career center about any concerns.
ContextBefore: students should discuss with their employer on any potential delays ahead of time. be aware of job scams! common scams are: receiving a job offer without applying, being offered the job without an interview, or sending someone money to accept the job. check the senders email address and see if it matches the domain of the company.
